label: 坂東
対訳語: A geographical term applied to all of Honshū east of Ashigara in Sagami-no-kuni.
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Sometimes Mutsu- and Dewa-no-kuni were included, but generally it referred to Sagami-, Musashi-, Kazusa-, Shimōsa-, Awa-, Kōzuke-, Shimotsuke-, and Hitachi-no-kuni. Key- Japan.
